articles.description: Reaction to Chelsea's victory at Crystal Palace in the Premier League, plus build-up to the Champions League as Manchester City travel to FC Copenhagen in the last 16.
articles.title: Premier League reaction and Champions League build-up

articles.description: Chelsea manager Mauricio Pochettino hails Conor Gallagher as a "priceless" player to have after his two goals inspire the Blues to victory at Crystal Palace.
articles.title: Gallagher a priceless player to have - Pochettino

articles.description: Victor Wembanyama posts a remarkable triple-double of 27 points, 14 rebounds and 10 blocks to lead San Antonio Spurs to a 122-99 win over Toronto Raptors.
articles.title: NBA: Victor Wembanyama makes 10 blocks in stunning triple-double as San Antonio Spurs beat Toronto Raptors

articles.description: England vice-captain Ollie Pope says there is "every chance" the tourists will field an extra seamer in the third Test against India in Rajkot.
articles.title: 'Every chance' of two seamers in third Test - Pope

articles.description: Teenager Luke Littler hits a nine-dart finish on his way to winning the title on his Players Championship debut.
articles.title: Luke Littler: Teenager hits nine-dart finish and wins Players Championship on debut

articles.description: Manchester City face FC Copenhagen and 'the Swedish Messi' Roony Bardghji in the Champions League on Tuesday, and BBC Sport has charted his rise.
articles.title: The 'unique' teenager who 'will join great Premier League club'

articles.description: Match of the Day 2's Mark Chapman, Stephen Warnock and Troy Deeney discuss which club is best positioned in this season's three-way Premier League title race.
articles.title: MOTD2: Who will win the Premier League title?

articles.description: Emma Raducanu says she "struggled with everything" as she was beaten by world number 30 Anhelina Kalinina in the first round of the Qatar Open.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu beaten by Anhelina Kalinina in first round of Qatar Open

articles.description: Which players impressed our football pundit Garth Crooks enough to make his latest Team of the Week?
articles.title: Who has looked imperious? Garth Crooks' Team of the Week

articles.description: Kylian Mbappe is unsure about Real Madrid's latest offer, Spurs are confident Ange Postecoglou will stay, PSG target Bernardo Silva, plus more.
articles.title: Mbappe unsure about Real offer - Tuesday's gossip
